title: follow up - The mention highlighted area is only updated after reopening the chat view when the name is updated
body:
# Problem

follow up issue for https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/pull/18270#issuecomment-1878530581

the mention highlighted area is only updated after reopening the chat view when the name is updated
Steps:

https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/67952253/294463599-f46772b7-56b0-46d2-b463-89bf696f97bc.MP4?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..wWqJB-wx8NGnLaBL9di4pSuIoNX9BRtPxXFdM5TPcys

## Acceptance Criteria

the light blue highlight area should be updated and fit the mention area

## Steps

- UserA: mention UserB in a chat
- UserB: update the name to make it shorter
- UserA: check the chat
